_meanings:
Subsequent or repeated
mention, referring to what has
been previously mentioned; 
reemployment of the same word in a
subsequent part of a sentence, or of
the same thing to perform a 
subsequent operation; {#AdeSaH kaTanaM#} 
{#anvAdeSaH anukaTanaM#} <ls>Kāśi.</ls> on <ls>P. II. 4. 32.</ls>
({#idaM#} and {#etad#} are said to assume the
forms {#ene, enO, enAn#} &c. in the sense
of {#anvAdeSa; kiMcitkAryaM viDAtumupAttasya#}
{#kAryAMtaraM viDAtuM punarupAdAnaM anvAdeSaH#}; <ab>e. g.</ab>
{#anena vyAkaraRamaDItaM enaM CaMdo'DyApaya#}; 
{#anayoH pavitraM kulaM enayoH praBUtaM svaM#} <ls>Sk.</ls>).
